list_definition.definition: a sauce made from fruit, vegetables and spices

list_ex_of_english: Momo is usually served with a dipping sauce (locally called "chutney/achhar"), normally made with tomato as the base ingredient.
Bafla and baati are always eaten with hot dal with pure ghee and chutney.
At home, "moong dal khechidi" and other khechidis are served with "pampad", pickle, curd, "aaloo bharta", or "baigan bharta", raita, dalma, and chutney.
We can ignore chutney and tomato sauce.
He produces mustard, marmalade and chutneys as well.
They are served hot and consumed with ketchup or chutney, such as mint, coriander or tamarind.
A combination of coriander and tamarind chutneys are often used as garnishments in addition to those mentioned above.
Her repertoire embraces party, soca, chutney soca, pan (steelband), feminist and patriotic songs.
